mapper.insert: insert into tbl_sales(count, purchaseid, itemid) values(#{count}, #{purchaseid}, #{itemid})

insert into tbl_purchase(recipientname, shippingaddr1, shippingaddr2, shippingpostcode, recipientphone, username, purchasedate, usedpoint) values(#{recipientname}, #{shippingaddr1}, #{shippingaddr2}, #{shippingpostcode}, #{recipientphone}, #{username}, now(), #{usedpoint})
mapper.select: select itemid, count from tbl_cart where username = #{username}

select sum(T.totalprice) as totalsalesprice, sum(T.point) as totalusedpoint, count(*) as totalcnt from (select sum(I.saleprice * S.count) as totalprice, P.usedpoint as point from tbl_purchase P, tbl_sales S, tbl_item I where P.purchasedate between #{start} and #{end} and P.purchaseid = S.purchaseid and I.itemid = S.itemid group by S.purchaseid) as T

select P.username, P.purchasedate, sum(I.saleprice * S.count) as totalprice, P.usedpoint from tbl_purchase P, tbl_sales S, tbl_item I where purchasedate between #{start} and #{end} and P.purchaseid = S.purchaseid and I.itemid = S.itemid group by S.purchaseid order by P.purchasedate asc limit #{firstrow}, #{pagecnt}

select sum(T.totalprice) as totalsalesprice, sum(T.point) as totalusedpoint, T.recipientname, T.addr1, T.addr2, T.purchaseid from (select sum(I.saleprice * S.count) as totalprice, P.usedpoint as point, P.recipientname as recipientname, P.shippingaddr1 as addr1, P.shippingaddr2 as addr2, P.purchaseid as purchaseid from tbl_purchase P, tbl_sales S, tbl_item I where P.purchasedate = #{purchasedate} and P.username = #{username} and P.purchaseid = S.purchaseid and I.itemid = S.itemid group by S.purchaseid) as T

select P.productname, I.color, I.size, I.originalprice, I.saleprice, S.count from tbl_sales S, tbl_item I, tbl_product P where S.purchaseid = #{purchaseid} and S.itemid = I.itemid and P.productid = I.productid;
